title: We should have this discussion while we still can

embed.description: The most comprehensive video on "games as a service" and why it's fraud that you're likely to see. WARNING: This is more boring than my usual videos. This was created as the beginning of an effort to get law authorities to examine this practice. Feel free to contact me about this topic.

body: If, of course, riot already has a end of life plan and releases that packet at the end of the game do let me and the community know. We all enjoy this game for the most part and would love to preserve it as long as possible even after it is no longer profitable to you. Much love.
